description: Try our easy to follow Pear & Pecan Buns With Maple Glaze recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Hot cross buns,Seafood free,Low salt,Soy free,Sesame free,Baking,Easter,Peanut free
name: Pear & Pecan Buns With Maple Glaze Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 4.5 cup plain flour (save 1/2 cup for flour paste)
1 cup beurre bosc pear, finely chopped

recipeInstructions.text: Combine flour, sugar, yeast and nutmeg in a large bowl. Add pear and 1/2 cup of the pecans and rub into flour mixture. Make a well in the centre.

Whisk milk, half of the maple syrup, butter and eggs together in a jug. Pour into flour mixture and mix well until combined. Turn out onto a floured benchtop and knead for 5 minutes or until smooth. Sprinkle all over with a little extra flour and place into a clean bowl. Cover with plastic and set aside in a warm place for 30 minutes or until doubled in size.

Punch dough down to its original size. Knead on a floured bench for 2 minutes or until smooth. Divide into 12 even pieces. Shape each into a ball and place into a roasting pan lined with baking paper, spaced 1cm apart. Cover with plastic wrap. Set aside for 30 minutes or until doubled in size. Preheat oven to 190Â°C.

Meanwhile, for the flour paste, mix 1/2 cup plain flour, 2 tbsp icing sugar, 1/2 teaspoon vanilla and 1/3 cup water together until smooth. Transfer to a small snap-lock bag and snip off the corner. Remove plastic from buns and pipe crosses onto buns.
Bake buns for 20-25 minutes or until golden. Brush warm buns with remaining maple syrup and top with remaining pecans.
